chainwork.description: (exactly 1) The estimated number of block header hashes miners had to check from the genesis block to this block, encoded as big-endian hex.

previousblockhash.description: The hash of the header of the previous block, encoded as hex in RPC byte order. Not returned for genesis block.

nextblockhash.description: The hash of the next block on the best block chain, if known, encoded as hex in RPC byte order.
